RefParameter.Name: SMBusPeripheralMode
RefParameter.Description: In case of switching your device form Slave ARP to Master (Peripheral mode SMBus Master) on your application, you need to set addressing mode parameters. And if you are using SMBUS device protocol and Host mode(Peripheral mode SMBus Master), please make sure that there may be at most one host in your system.
